item.title: Research Idea
item.description:
This post records research ideas of my interest.

靡不有初，鲜克有终。

composite.js

The rendering tool used in our composite visualization project can be converted into a useful javascript library (although we have to refactor the code). The purpose of this tool is to make it easier for users to design and create composite visualizations.

Reference:

  • PiCCL: Data-Driven Composition of Bespoke Pictorial Charts
  • Manipulable Semantic Components: a Computational Representation of Data Visualization Scenes
